item.title: A video shows people trying to pull 2 black bear cubs from trees in North Carolina
item.description: A video shows apartment complex residents in North Carolina trying to pull two wild black bear cubs from a tree to pose with them. One person manages to grab a cub before it runs away.
item.content:encoded: A video shows apartment complex residents in North Carolina trying to pull two wild black bear cubs from a tree to pose with them. One person manages to grab a cub before it runs away.

item.title: Military court convicts U.S. sailor of attempted espionage
item.description: A naval chief petty officer who served on a Japan-based destroyer was found guilty of sharing classified information with a foreign government, the Navy's investigative agency said.

item.title: Biden administration restricts oil and gas leasing in Alaska's petroleum reserve
item.description: The administration said it will restrict new oil and gas leasing on 13 million acres in Alaska to help protect wildlife such as caribou and polar bears as the Arctic continues to warm.

item.title: Man who set himself on fire outside Trump trial dies of injuries, police say
item.description: The man took out pamphlets espousing conspiracy theories, tossed them around, then doused himself in an accelerant and set himself on fire outside the courthouse Friday, officials and witnesses said.
